member.name: T:PhaseMode
member.summary: Method of sign-convention when defining argument

member.name: F:PhaseMode.ArgPrimary
member.summary: Restrict phase in argument of complex number Z within range -π < Arg(Z) ≤ π

member.name: F:PhaseMode.ArgSecondary
member.summary: Angle phase in argument of complex number Z within range 0 ≤ arg(Z) < 2π
